View.Name: View_Batch_Crontrigger
View.Source: select c."IDCRONTRIGGER",c."IDJOB",c."MINUTI",c."ORE",c."GIORNODELMESE",c."MESE",c."GIORNODELLASETTIMANA", Jobname, Groupname From Batch_Crontrigger c, batch_job j where c.idJob = j.idJob

View.Name: View_Clienti
View.Source: select c."IDCLIENTE",c."RAGIONESOCIALE",c."INDIRIZZO",c."CODTIPOCLIENTE",c."PARTITAIVA",c."CODICEFISCALE",c."DATAULTIMOACQUISTO",c."NOTE", CASE WHEN sysdate - dataultimoacquisto < 30 THEN 'G' WHEN sysdate - dataultimoacquisto < 60 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'R' END stato from clienti c

Package.Name: LIB
LIB_CALENDARIO
LIB_LOB
LIB_LOGGING
LIB_SICUREZZA
